channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Location Intelligence family
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Location Intelligence family

item.title: CVE-2024-41682|2024-08-13T17:54:30.651Z -- siemens -- location%20intelligence%20family
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Location Intelligence family (All versions < V4.4). Affected products do not properly enforce restriction of excessive authentication attempts. This could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to conduct brute force attacks against legitimate user passwords.

item.title: CVE-2024-41683|2024-08-13T07:54:21.192Z -- siemens -- location%20intelligence%20family
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Location Intelligence family (All versions < V4.4). Affected products do not properly enforce a strong user password policy. This could facilitate a brute force attack against legitimate user passwords.

item.title: CVE-2024-41682|2024-08-13T07:54:19.932Z -- siemens -- location%20intelligence%20family
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Location Intelligence family (All versions < V4.4). Affected products do not properly enforce restriction of excessive authentication attempts. This could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to conduct brute force attacks against legitimate user passwords.

item.title: CVE-2024-41681|2024-08-13T07:54:18.686Z -- siemens -- location%20intelligence%20family
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Location Intelligence family (All versions < V4.4). The web server of affected products is configured to support weak ciphers by default. This could allow an unauthenticated attacker in an on-path position to to read and modify any data passed over the connection between legitimate clients and the affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-41681|2024-08-13T13:50:59.341Z -- siemens -- location%20intelligence%20family
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Location Intelligence family (All versions < V4.4). The web server of affected products is configured to support weak ciphers by default. This could allow an unauthenticated attacker in an on-path position to to read and modify any data passed over the connection between legitimate clients and the affected device.

item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Location Intelligence family (All versions < V4.4). Affected products do not properly enforce a strong user password policy. This could facilitate a brute force attack against legitimate user passwords.
